empresa.title: WHO WE ARE
empresa.p_mision: To support the growth of our clients through business advice provided through our services.
empresa.p_vision: To be a Mexican company that builds trust in society through our employees, thus achieving constant growth alongside our customers.
empresa.p_historia: ITARIFF originated from the industry's need to fully comply with customs regulations... and its strength lies in the quality and trust in our expert collaborators in the field.

servicios.title: OUR SERVICES
servicios.propuesta_valor_text: At ITARIFF, we are committed to bringing the best practices in Mexican customs compliance to your company. Contact us and our team of experts will support you throughout the process.
servicios.valor_cliente: Customer-oriented, where our experts are preferred and trusted by our clients.
servicios.valor_adaptacion: ADAPTATION to the requirements of the Mexican government.
servicios.valor_mejoras: Development of IMPROVEMENTS in customs compliance.
servicios.valor_sinergias: SYNERGIES with associations to achieve the best approach to the authorities.
servicios.valor_tranquilidad: We generate your PEACE OF MIND by managing and controlling your customs obligations.
servicios.anexo24_desc: Inventory control and registration of temporarily imported goods.
servicios.anexo30_desc: Administration and control of obligations for companies certified in VAT & IEPS.
servicios.cumplimiento_desc: Audits, training, coaching and procedures before the customs authority.
servicios.modal_desc_anexo24: Annex 24 is crucial for compliance with foreign trade obligations. We ensure the proper registration and control of balances.
servicios.modal_desc_anexo30: Annex 30 applies to VAT & IEPS certified companies. We manage the monitoring and proof of VAT payments for temporary imports.
servicios.modal_desc_cumplimiento: We offer a comprehensive service package to ensure smooth customs operations. This includes audits and training.
servicios.sub_admin24_desc: The obligation to demonstrate the return of temporarily imported goods is administered, audited and controlled through tools that comply with the requirements before the authority for foreign trade purposes.
servicios.sub_audit24_desc: Verification that it complies with the appropriate legal and technical provisions for the correct capture of information from base catalogs, production information, customs information, and its download.
servicios.sub_admin30_title: ADMINISTRATION OF ANNEX 30 FOR VAT & IEPS CERTIFIED COMPANIES
servicios.sub_admin30_desc: The obligation to demonstrate payment of VAT on temporary imports through their returns is administered and monitored.
servicios.sub_audit30_title: SPECIFIC AUDIT OF ANNEX 30 FOR VAT & IEPS CERTIFIED COMPANIES
servicios.sub_audit30_desc: Verification that it complies with legal provisions and submission of information to the authorities for full compliance with VAT & IEPS certification, thereby avoiding its cancellation or suspension.
servicios.sub_audit_prevention_desc: In-depth analysis of your operations, tariff classification and foreign trade records to mitigate risks.
servicios.sub_capacitacion_desc: Tailor-made courses and workshops to train your team on critical issues of Mexican customs legislation.
servicios.sub_coaching_desc: Direct support for resolving requirements and managing procedures (registries, certifications, etc.) before the SAT/AGA.

cumplimiento.subtitle: GET TO KNOW IT STEP BY STEP
cumplimiento.paso_1_desc: Avoid suspension of the importers registry, the benefits of the IMMEX, PROSEC, Rule 8 programs, the Free Trade Agreements, the VAT & IEPS Certification and the Trusted Company (AEO).
cumplimiento.paso_2_desc: Avoid overpayment due to lack of knowledge regarding the full application of tariff preferences under Free Trade Agreements, PROSEC, and Rule 8 on imported goods.
cumplimiento.paso_3_desc: Avoid paying fines for not having the necessary documents to prove the Import, Export, Change of Regime, Regularization, Transfer, Destruction or Donation of goods during verification by the tax or customs authorities.
cumplimiento.paso_4_desc: We review and validate the balances and reports generated by your system against the authority's database (SAT/AGA).
cumplimiento.paso_5_desc: Avoid paying fines for not having the system in accordance with the law and fines for not demonstrating the return of temporarily imported goods during verification powers of the customs authorities.
cumplimiento.paso_6_desc: Avoid the suspension of VAT certification and the payment of said tax, thus avoiding significant economic impacts on cash flow due to its payment per operation.
cumplimiento.paso_7_desc: Avoiding duplicate tax payments, fines, and seizure of goods due to the inability to prove legal stay in the country during verification procedures by customs authorities.
